body.name: Pour Over Coffee Maker, Ceramic Coffee Dripper, Easy Manual Slow Brewing Accessories for Home, Cafe, Coffee Bar Accessories and Kitchen Decor, Filter Size 2, White

features: Classic Ceramic Dripper: Our pour over coffee maker is an essential vessel for producing an evenly brewed cup of coffee. Created to set on top of your favorite mug or glass carafe, water slowly drips through the three-holed bottom. The pour over coffee dripper brews delicious flavorful coffee and lets you have a traditional hands-on brewing experience with minimal effort.

Super Cute Country Design: Designed with the sleek text and rustic look style, our pour over coffee cone will surely add a country charm to your kitchen countertops, stovetops or coffee bars. This coffee dripper fits perfectly with any modern vintage decor and cute kitchen accessories.

Pour Over Excellence and Pour Control: The specialty shape and unique vertical groove of coffee pour overs allow you to extract optimum flavor from your favorite ground coffee. This manual brew maker features 3 holes, improving pour flow to keep the coffee from flowing through too quickly and provides the proper brewing time. Use with a high quality size 02 paper filter - FILTERS NOT INCLUDED.

High Quality Material: Made of high-fired ceramic, with good heat preservation and durability. Unlike cheap plastic coffee drippers, this ceramic dripper does not absorb odors or pass on chemical taste into your brew. Ceramic design prevents heat loss during brewing.

Perfect Gift for Coffee Lover: This cone coffee maker is great as gifts for coffee lovers, or hostess gifts for at-home baristas, which are perfect for every occasion like Mother's Day, Birthdays, Housewarming, Thanksgiving and Christmas. If you are ever unhappy with the product, just let us know and we will solve it for you immediately. We pride ourselves on high-quality products and happy customers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to Make Pour-over Coffee Place filter in dripper Pour a little water in to wet the dripper. Empty water from cup Add your favorite ground coffee (Recommend 2-3 Tbsp) Slowly pour water over - allow coffee to "bloom"

Pour Over Excellence The specialty shape and unique vertical groove of coffee pour overs allow you to extract optimum flavor from your favorite ground coffee. Pour Control This manual brew maker features 3 holes, improving pour flow to keep the coffee from flowing through too quickly and provides the proper brewing time. Use with a high quality size 02 paper filter - FILTERS NOT INCLUDED. Coffee Bar Decor This cone coffee maker is great as gifts for coffee lovers, or hostess gifts for at-home baristas, which are perfect for every occasion like Mother's Day, Birthdays, Housewarming, Thanksgiving and Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes good coffee
reviews.reviewText: Love the look of this. filters fit perfectly. the drip works well. Looks more expensive than it is. I can't remember if this size pour over comes with 4 holes instead of three, which would give you a faster cup of coffee. That would be the only advantage of a different one. But i'm very happy with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and sturdy ceramic
reviews.reviewText: Decided I wanted to try the pour over coffee and compare it to my drip coffee maker. This wins hands down. I now have this little coffee ritual and although it is psychological, I find as I am going through the motions, my anticipation of a good, smooth cup of coffee is heightened. Kind of weird really, and my daughter laughed when I told her about. Seems almost like the Japanese tea-house rituals without the spiritual aspect. Anyway, takes a little time, but I don't mind waiting for a good thing. The cup itself is very nice and sturdy. It stores well by just setting it on another cup in the back part of the cabinet, and clean up is just a swift rinse and dry. I use the melitta cone filters, #2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little " one cuppa"
reviews.reviewText: I attend many retreats and conferences and hate the coffee in the hotels. I find I can heat the water using their little machine, then bring my own coffee and #2 filter and make a delicious cup of coffee. This little ceramic cup is very sturdy, cleans easily and very easy to pack. It also works great at home for a single cup of coffee in the afternoon or evening. I hate using the individual plastic Kcups. Bad for the environment and very expensive!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars not as I thought
reviews.reviewText: It's great, nice heavy porcelain, and works - that's what I needed... it's just a bit smaller than it looked, but then most Amazon stuff comes with something odd to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, Effective, and Looks Good
reviews.reviewText: I love this simple pourover coffee maker. It looks great, and the word "coffee" printed on one side stops it from being too plain. From a practical standpoint, it's great because it holds a #2 cone paper filter perfectly. No sludge gets in the bottom of the cup! It has three fairly big holes in the bottom for the brewed coffee to come out, so I don't have to wait forever to get my completed coffee. It's pretty sweet, especially at its very affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My wife and I wanted to try out pour over coffee for awhile and this was a great way to do it. The value for the money is great and the coffee tastes wonderful. I highly recommend for anyone who is interested in exploring new ways to have delicious coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and works
reviews.reviewText: This does exactly what it needs to do. It’s also very cute. I wanted the ceramic so I didn’t have to worry about plastic leaching into my coffee. Easy to clean. I purchased two. One for me and one for mom. Works for coffee or loose tea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a simple concept
reviews.reviewText: After my old coffee maker burnt out, I ordered this. Used it once, and the coffee is delicious. The device takes the same #2 paper cone filters that I have always used, and is easy to clean. Hopefully it will prove to be sturdy--it looks like solid construction. Of course, one needs to heat water separately, so all-in-all the labor involved is about the same as before.
